short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that displays YouTube thumbnail of the video you are watching, and when clicking, gives a link to download it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View the YouTube thumbnail of the video you are currently watching seamlessly on sidebar

Option to toggle the visibility of the thumbnail viewer with a simple button click.

Click on the thumbnail to see the full screen, downloadable version

Low size, so fast load times
